name: Reginald HOBSON, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and PA. Board of Probation and Parole, Respondents

parties: Reginald HOBSON, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and PA. Board of Probation and Parole, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of May, 2013, the “Notice for Hearing or: Notice of Appeal” and “Motion for Default Judgment” are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
66 A.3d 761
Reginald HOBSON, Petitioner v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and PA. Board of Probation and Parole, Respondents.
No. 31 EM 2013.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 3, 2013.
